page.title: 19 YOUTH ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: At primary and secondary school you do not do the same things at break.At primary school you play more active games such as Â£It'-this involves one person being Â£It' ,chasing the rest to catch one person making them Â£It'. Another popular game isÂ£Kiss Catch' this is played by boys chasing girls (or VV) catching them to kiss them. They also have crazes at primary school such as bouncy balls, elastic bands e.t.c. At secondary school we do not play so many childish games because we are more mature and we prefer just to gossip and complain about our homework!
